divs: Sighting Detailsi was taking pictures of the sun,i felt something in the air cant explain. when i looked at photos i saw orbs many of them and even a cylinder shape surrounding the sun. I also notice the sun was surrounded by pinkish red petals of light like flower petals. I took some videos too & saw this disc darting to and from towards the sun with a trail of light always behind it. the center was bright blue & outer edges were violet purple, I thought it may be a lens flare from my camera but I was using my cell phone which is 8 megapixels so I don't know if that would happen, in a few pics the orbs varied from bright white to transparent & there were many of them at same time. I just felt a sense of a presence in the sky around me.
Object Shape: Bullet, Missile, Cylinder, Disc, Fireball, Sphere, Other
Summary: disc shaped purple sphere of light on outer side neon blue circle in center yellow orange to gold emission
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Hampton
There were no other sightings in Hampton on or around April 25th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
